sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' function Movie(props) { const [movieParams,setMovieParams] =useState(props.movieParams) const [movie,setMovie]=useState('') const [count,setCount]=useState(0) async function getRec(req,res){ const fetched_rec= await axios.get('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie', {params: movieParams}) setMovie(fetched_rec.data.results[count]) console.log(movie) setCount(count+1); } useEffect(()=>{ getRec(); },[]) return (

{movie.title}

Vote count {movie.vote_count}
In stock
Size Guide

Free shipping on all continental US orders.

) } export default Movie
